 <span style="color:Darkblue">Before using the function `moimport`, users need to check the dataset to see if it meets the following requirements:</span>
------

1. The dataset is placed in the  <span style="color:green">first worksheet</span> of the excel file and contains only <span style="color:green"> molecular data</span>,

1. <span style="color:green">Sample IDs</span> are placed in the <span style="color:green">first column</span>,

1. <span style="color:green"> Marker labels</span> are placed in the <span style="color:green">first row</span>,

1. <span style="color:green">Sample IDs</span> and <span style="color:green">marker labels</span> must be <span style="color:green">unique</span>,

1. Entries which contain <span style="color:green">word or sentences are removed</span> from data,

1. <span style="color:green">Metdata columns</span> are placed between sample IDs and molecular marker columns.

1. In case of <span style="color:green">multiple worksheet</span> dataset, all worksheets need to meet the above requirements.

1. In case of <span style="color:green">transposed datasets</span>, columns will be swaped with rows.
